text: 21:18 Jon 13:36; Aposel 12:3-4Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ fomɨra igiamra ikia, nɨ uabɨ letiam uan ivariam ikegha danganir nɨ mangasa ifongezibagh arui. Egh nɨ ghurighamin dughiam, nɨ uan agharimning feghtɨ, gumazir igharazim nɨ gikegh nɨ inigh danganir nɨ mangasa ifongezir puvatɨzimɨn mangam.”
